props.title: Excellent Type Casting!
props.message: You've mastered explicit and implicit type conversions in Java.
props.explanation: Type casting allows you to convert variables from one type to another. Explicit casting uses (dataType) syntax, like (int)95.7, which truncates the decimal. Implicit casting happens automatically when converting a smaller type to a larger one, like int to double.
